Welcome to egg_roll_v2’s documentation!¶

egg_roll_v2

egg_roll_v2.Level(grid)

This class is the model handling all logic involving the grid.

egg_roll_v2.Player(level_file[, freedom, ...])

This class is the controller and view handling all inputs and prints.

egg_roll_v2.clear_screen(is_debug)

Clears the terminal screen, if any, while is_debug is False

menu_v2

menu_v2.Menu([is_debug])

This is the class handling all Main Menu displays.
